name: WS Theme Addons
author: WEN Solutions

sections.description:
Provides Additional Features and functionalities for themes. Provides one click demo importer functionality for themes from WEN Solutions.

Features

  • One Click Demo Import for Travel Log theme(https://wordpress.org/themes/travel-log/).
  • Widgets
    • WS Instagram Widget
    • Twitter Widget
    • Facebook Widget
    • Call to Action Widget
    • Weather Widget
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  • Select ws-theme-addons.zip from your computer
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  • Download ws-theme-addons.zip
  • Extract the ws-theme-addons directory to your computer
  • Upload the ws-theme-addons directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

Release Date: 24th June, 2022

Enhancement:

  • Compatibility tested with WordPress 6.0.
  • Added Sort / Toggle Options in Homepage Sections.
  • Hide copyright info in footer section.
  • Added the support for Instagram Access Token.
  • Added Footer Copyright text removal / update functionality for Travel Log theme.
  • Added Widgets
    • Twitter Widget
    • Facebook Widget
    • Call to Action Widget
    • Weather Widget

1.0.5

  • Release Date : December 3, 2019
  • Compatibility tested upto 5.3.

1.0.4

  • Fixes: Minor Bug Fixings
  • Enhancement: Added the support for Instagram Access Token.

1.0.3

  • Fixes: Minor Bug Fixings and Compatibility tests upto 5.2.2.

1.0.2

  • Enhancements: Travel Log Demo content imported directly from addon.
  • Fixes: Minor Bug Fixings and Compatibility tests with latest WP Version.

1.0.1

  • Fixes : Instagram feed issue fixes.
  • Fixes : Minor Bug Fixings.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.
